main event: A witness observed a bright yellow white object that resembled a star over Kittanning, Pennsylvania, for approximately 20 minutes in November 1967.
interesting points: The object remained stationary with slight oscillations before diminishing and disappearing., The witness noted other stars in the vicinity, including VEGA and ALTAIR., The observation was made at a 45-degree elevation., The report indicates no physical evidence was found., A request was made to the witness to complete an official reporting form for additional details.
sighted object: bright yellow white object in the sky
witness description: A civilian observer who reported the sighting
